snippet: Narcy Novack was convicted in White Plains of hiring the men who killed Ben Novack Jr., a millionaire, in Rye Brook, N.Y., and Bernice Novack in Florida in 2009.
abstract: Narcy Novack, of Fort Lauderdale, Fla,  is sentenced to life in prison; Novack and her brother Cristobel Veliz were convicted of orchestrating the 2009 killings of her husband Ben Novack Jr in Rye Brook, NY, and of his mother Bernice in Fort Lauderdale, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Narcy Novack was convicted in White Plains of hiring the men who killed Ben Novack Jr., a millionaire, in Rye Brook, N.Y., and Bernice Novack in Florida in 2009.

headline.seo: Florida Woman Gets Life Sentence in Deaths of Husband and His Mother
headline.main: Woman Gets Life Sentence for 2 Killings
headline.print_headline: Woman Gets Life Sentence For 2 Killings
